structure.unit: Inspection Of Boilers, Air Tanks, Etc. Licenses Of Engineers, Firemen, And Operators Of Hoisting Machinery

law.catch_line: Appeals; Board Of Appeal; Finality Of Decision
law.text: A person aggrieved by the action of a single examiner in refusing, suspending or revoking a license to act as engineer, fireman or operator of hoisting machinery may, within one week, appeal therefrom to the chief, who shall appoint three inspectors of the division, or himself and two inspectors, to act together as a board of appeal. The decision of a majority of the members of the board of appeal shall be final.
